I use the DVD of the interview with Jim Collins in all my Leadership Academies.  Frank Benest

author: Robert Carty
text:
We'd like to know if you use, have used, or would like to use the Leading Ideas content in your coursework. Members can find all the videos in the ICMA University section, under Leadership Development.
http://icma.org/en/university/leadership_development/leading_ideas
Now viewable on most smartphones and tablets!
title: Does anyone use the Leading Ideas videos in class?
